afterAction ( )OVERRIDDEN

debug.t[461]

Do nothing after the main action

exec (cmd)OVERRIDDEN

debug.t[450]

We override exec() rather than exeAction() here, since we want to skip all the normal turn sequence routines such as before and after notifications and advancing the turn count.
